Posts.Content:
I woke up this morning and there was a dark discharge coming from one breast. Just a little but it was there. The other day i had a terrible stabbing/lightning bolt feeling go through the same breast. Does this sound familiar to anyone? I did a self examination and didnt feel anything. I made an appointment with the doc on monday and id like some information b4 i go. Can anyone ease my worried mind or give me any stats on symptoms. I am 50.
Thanks
Sylvia
Posts.Title: symptoms

Posts.Content: Just wanted to tell you that the doctor ordered a sonagram. She said that it probably is a palup behind the nipple. She said they usually are not cancer. So time to pray hu?
Posts.Title: symptoms

Posts.Content:
Thanks Elizabeth,
The doctor said there is a local type procedure they do for it and it differs depending on if it is cancer. Still i am a bit numb over all this. Since it is behind the nipple i can imagine it wont be fun. I have arthritis and fibromyalgia. If i were to have chemo or radiation it would destroy what little quality of life i have right now. This is my main concern. Ya know i hope they are close to finding out what causes it. Or a real cure that dont destroy you immune system.
Posts.Title: symptoms

Posts.Content:
WOW! That was amazing. Support is everything hu? Thank you for the quick response. No discharge this morning. I spoke with my sister and she reminded me that my breasts always had stabbing pains when i was pregnant. I quickly reminded her that my morning sickness was my real clue and i am not feeling any nausea. I have never had one single menopause symptom. My mother never did -her periods just tapered down to a stop. No hormone drugs or hot flashes. Must have been her reward for having 6 babies. Thanks again for the support. I will let u know.
lil
